comments:
build i1212-0010

- I created a general project and put a file (readme.txt) in it.
- then I created another general project
- in the package explorer, I selected the readme.txt file and drag-n-dropped it (with Ctrl) to copy it to the new project.
- the copy worked ok but I got the following exception in my log:
